title: Om saccidAnandamE
sahitya:
Om saccidAnandamE parabrahmamE Om saccidAnandamE


anupallavi

  tAmasa rAjasa satva guNam kaDanda tarpparamE tillai sirpparamE shivamE


caraNam    shAnta sukha ghana siddhAnta  shuddhAdvaita shata sadvilAsamAgi sakala niSkaLamAgi
kAntam pOl uyirinaik-kavarndu kalandirundE kaNNait-tirandu tannaik-kATTum kadir maNiyE
